<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <style>
        body {
            margin: 0;
        }

        #follow-image {
            position: fixed; /* Change from absolute to fixed */
            pointer-events: none;
            transition: transform 0.1s ease-out;
            width: 100px; /* Set the width of the image */
        }
    </style>
    <title>Cursor Follow Image</title>
</head>
<body>
    <img id="follow-image" src="salamander.png" alt="Follow Cursor Image">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            const image = document.getElementById('follow-image');

            // Get half of the image width and height
            const halfWidth = image.width / 2;
            const halfHeight = image.height / 2;

            document.addEventListener('mousemove', function (event) {
                const x = event.clientX - halfWidth;
                const y = event.clientY - halfHeight;

                // Adjust the image position
                const transformValue = `translate(${x}px, ${y}px)`;
                image.style.transform = transformValue;
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
